one.block.eosiojava.utilities

Class ByteFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • one.block.eosiojava.utilities.ByteFormatter

  • public class ByteFormatter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides methods for transforming and formatting byte data to and from different formats in use on the blockchain.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ByteFormatter(@NotNull byte[] context) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      static ByteFormatter createFromBase64(@NotNull java.lang.String base64String)
      Create and initialize a ByteFormatter from a Base64 encoded string.
      static ByteFormatter createFromHex(@NotNull java.lang.String hexString)
      Create and initialize a ByteFormatter from a hex encoded string.
      ByteFormatter sha256()
      Calculate the sha256 hash of the current ByteFormatter context and return it as a new ByteFormatter.
      java.lang.String toHex()
      Convert the current ByteFormatter contents to a Hex encoded string and return it.

    • Method Detail

      • createFromBase64

        public static ByteFormatter createFromBase64(@NotNull
                                             @NotNull java.lang.String base64String)
        Create and initialize a ByteFormatter from a Base64 encoded string. The Base64 string will have its padding checked and adjusted if necessary.
        Parameters:
        base64String - - Base64 encoded string.
        Returns:
        - Initialized ByteFormatter

      • createFromHex

        public static ByteFormatter createFromHex(@NotNull
                                          @NotNull java.lang.String hexString)
        Create and initialize a ByteFormatter from a hex encoded string.
        Parameters:
        hexString - - Hex encoded string.
        Returns:
        - Initialized ByteFormatter

      • toHex

        public java.lang.String toHex()
        Convert the current ByteFormatter contents to a Hex encoded string and return it.
        Returns:
        - Hex encoded string representation of the current formatter context.

      • sha256

        public ByteFormatter sha256()
        Calculate the sha256 hash of the current ByteFormatter context and return it as a new ByteFormatter.
        Returns:
        - New ByteFormatter containing the sha256 hash of the current one.
